data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Southern, Hong Kong with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Southern with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.section_summary: On average, 23 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Southern, Hong Kong.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Southern, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 16,843 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Southern.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Southern, Hong Kong need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 16,843 believers in the state of Southern the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 16,843 believers in Southern.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Southern, Hong Kong has a population of 275,200.

We estimate Southern has 16,843 people who might know Jesus, 19,168 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 239,189 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
